content: The Pungent Flesh Chunk is one of the Key Items you can find in Yellow Wind Ridge during Chapter 2. It is unmissable as it is dropped from the mandatory boss: King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince in Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pungent_Flesh_Chunk.md', within the main section titled 'Pungent Flesh Chunk'.
The content is as follows:
The Pungent Flesh Chunk is one of the Key Items you can find in Yellow Wind Ridge during Chapter 2. It is unmissable as it is dropped from the mandatory boss: King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince in Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair.
